articles.title: Tesla drives into Gurugram with India’s 1st all-in-one centre - Tribune India
articles.description: Tesla opens Indias biggest unit combining retail, after-sales service, delivery and charging facilities under one roof.
articles.content:
Tesla India on Thursday announced the opening of Indias first all-in-one integrated Tesla centre in Gurugram, marking a major step in the companys plan to expand electric mobility in the country.
